utilities

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Shape
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circular, Prism

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Shape>
    An abstract class shape that contains the attributes that are shared across all shapes.
    Version:
    1.0 Created on February 19, 2020
    Author:
    Casey Majandog
